name: HAROWEEN
description: On this spooky Halloween night skeletons arose from the ground. Terrorizing the kids on Baker street. Their only mission, to ruin this very night by stealing candy from the clutches of every child in sight. Your mission, as Elizabeth, is to track down those rotten skeletons to take back the night, and the candy for the kids.  To do so you must strategically place pumpkin bombs around the map, leading your foes to their destruction. Track down as many candies as you can to the escape through the cauldron back to town.
